    Class used to check if two areas intersect each other.

        public static boolean rectangles(long x1,
                 long y1,
                 long width1,
                 long height1,
                 long x2,
                 long y2,
                 long width2,
                 long height2)
        Check whether two rectangles with the specified dimensions intersect.
        Parameters:
        x1 - The horizontal location of the first rectangle.
        y1 - The vertical location of the first rectangle.
        width1 - The width of the first rectangle.
        height1 - The height of the first rectangle.
        x2 - The horizontal location of the second rectangle.
        y2 - The vertical location of the second rectangle.
        width2 - The width of the second rectangle.
        height2 - The height of the second rectangle.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the two rectangles intersect.

        Check whether two cube with the specified dimensions intersect.
        Parameters:
        x1 - The horizontal location of the first cube.
        y1 - The vertical location of the first cube.
        width1 - The width of the first cube.
        height1 - The height of the first cube.
        depth1 - The depth of the first cube.
        x2 - The horizontal location of the second cube.
        y2 - The vertical location of the second cube.
        width2 - The width of the second cube.
        height2 - The height of the second cube.
        depth2 - The depth of the second cube.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the two cubes intersect.
